channel.title: CVE Feed for Samsung Mobile -- Galaxy Store
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Samsung Mobile -- Galaxy Store

item.title: CVE-2023-21433|2024-08-02T09:36:34.444Z -- samsung%20mobile -- galaxy%20store
item.description: Improper access control vulnerability in Galaxy Store prior to version 4.5.49.8 allows local attackers to install applications from Galaxy Store.

item.title: CVE-2023-42581|2024-08-02T19:23:39.901Z -- samsung%20mobile -- galaxy%20store
item.description: Improper URL validation from InstantPlay deeplink in Galaxy Store prior to version 4.5.64.4 allows attackers to execute JavaScript API to access data.

item.title: CVE-2023-21514|2024-08-02T09:44:01.286Z -- samsung%20mobile -- galaxy%20store
item.description: Improper scheme validation from InstantPlay Deeplink in Galaxy Store prior to version 4.5.49.8 allows attackers to execute javascript API to install APK from Galaxy Store.

item.title: CVE-2023-42580|2024-08-02T19:23:39.771Z -- samsung%20mobile -- galaxy%20store
item.description: Improper URL validation from MCSLaunch deeplink in Galaxy Store prior to version 4.5.64.4 allows attackers to execute JavaScript API to install APK from Galaxy Store.

item.title: CVE-2023-21434|2024-08-02T09:36:34.508Z -- samsung%20mobile -- galaxy%20store
item.description: Improper input validation vulnerability in Galaxy Store prior to version 4.5.49.8 allows local attackers to execute JavaScript by launching a web page.

item.title: CVE-2023-30705|2024-08-02T14:37:14.615Z -- samsung%20mobile -- galaxy%20store
item.description: Improper sanitization of incoming intent in Galaxy Store prior to version 4.5.56.6?allows local attackers to access privileged content providers as Galaxy Store permission.

item.title: CVE-2023-21515|2024-08-02T09:44:01.684Z -- samsung%20mobile -- galaxy%20store
item.description: InstantPlay which included vulnerable script which could execute javascript in Galaxy Store prior to version 4.5.49.8 allows attackers to execute javascript API to install APK from Galaxy Store.

item.title: CVE-2023-21516|2024-08-02T09:44:01.162Z -- samsung%20mobile -- galaxy%20store
item.description: XSS vulnerability from InstantPlay in Galaxy Store prior to version 4.5.49.8 allows attackers to execute javascript API to install APK from Galaxy Store.

item.title: CVE-2024-20822|2024-07-05T17:21:36.500Z -- samsung%20mobile -- galaxy%20store
item.description: Implicit intent hijacking vulnerability in AccountActivity of Galaxy Store prior to version 4.5.63.6 allows local attackers to access sensitive information via implicit intent.

item.title: CVE-2024-20824|2024-07-05T17:21:38.541Z -- samsung%20mobile -- galaxy%20store
item.description: Implicit intent hijacking vulnerability in VoiceSearch of Galaxy Store prior to version 4.5.63.6 allows local attackers to access sensitive information via implicit intent.

item.title: CVE-2024-20870|2024-06-04T17:40:12.057Z -- samsung%20mobile -- galaxy%20store
item.description: Improper verification of intent by broadcast receiver vulnerability in Galaxy Store prior to version 4.5.71.8 allows local attackers to write arbitrary files with the privilege of Galaxy Store.

item.title: CVE-2024-20825|2024-02-06T02:23:15.543Z -- samsung%20mobile -- galaxy%20store
item.description: Implicit intent hijacking vulnerability in IAP of Galaxy Store prior to version 4.5.63.6 allows local attackers to access sensitive information via implicit intent.

item.title: CVE-2024-20824|2024-02-06T02:23:14.512Z -- samsung%20mobile -- galaxy%20store
item.description: Implicit intent hijacking vulnerability in VoiceSearch of Galaxy Store prior to version 4.5.63.6 allows local attackers to access sensitive information via implicit intent.

item.title: CVE-2024-20823|2024-06-04T17:40:37.738Z -- samsung%20mobile -- galaxy%20store
item.description: Implicit intent hijacking vulnerability in SamsungAccount of Galaxy Store prior to version 4.5.63.6 allows local attackers to access sensitive information via implicit intent.

item.description: Implicit intent hijacking vulnerability in AccountActivity of Galaxy Store prior to version 4.5.63.6 allows local attackers to access sensitive information via implicit intent.

item.description: Implicit intent hijacking vulnerability in VoiceSearch of Galaxy Store prior to version 4.5.63.6 allows local attackers to access sensitive information via implicit intent.

item.description: Improper verification of intent by broadcast receiver vulnerability in Galaxy Store prior to version 4.5.71.8 allows local attackers to write arbitrary files with the privilege of Galaxy Store.

item.description: Implicit intent hijacking vulnerability in AccountActivity of Galaxy Store prior to version 4.5.63.6 allows local attackers to access sensitive information via implicit intent.

item.description: Implicit intent hijacking vulnerability in IAP of Galaxy Store prior to version 4.5.63.6 allows local attackers to access sensitive information via implicit intent.
